name: Escape From The Underworld
description:
Find the escape from the underworld!

Controls:

Keyboard:
Controller
(XBox , Playstation, some other):Attack:left mouse button or space key
any of the buttons for right thumb ( A, B, X, Y etc.)
Movement:WASD or arrow keys
D-Pad
